author: [Anonymous]
text: For those organizations that equip their own police cars (racks, radios, bars, lights, cameras, computers, etc.) approximately how many are completed in a week? How many staff (FTE) are assigned to this activity and what components are you responsible for? Have any organizations privatized this activity and, if so, did you achieve quicker deployments and/or cost savings?
title: Outfitting Police Cars
